feed.title: Wolfsky
feed.subtitle: Just a place for a queer trans woman to control her fate.

entry.title: Introduction
entry.content: A couple of days ago, I read this great post by @nora.zone on Bluesky: The Website Manifesto. I’m not a prolific poster on any socials, I mainly just repost stuff that I like, but I think Nora is right; it is important to have a place that you control. Safe from the whims of the owners of the social networks.
